description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to reserved matters approval for Plot 1 reference 22/2863/RMA dated 14/10/2022 within Phase 5A of Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme comprising the following; amendments to retail frontage including the omission of the previously approved Glulam timber beams at first floor in lieu of ppc aluminium; introduction of masonry freeze above ground level masonry columns to all facades; amendments to slot window design and façade detailing on north west elevation facing Station Eastern Entrance Building; amendments to twelfth floor sky frame openings and elevation details (south east and north east elevations); amendments to rooftop elements and roof level screening of mechanical plant; amendments to ground floor railway street façade including introduction of dockmasters office window and aluminium panels; amendments to ground floor south east façade including introduction of aluminium panels, louvred panel for mechanical plant and door openings.
